name: CoronaVirus Killer
description:
I developed this game while in isolation during this difficult period of the pandemic outbreak as a means to pass the time and to hopefully entertain others that are in a similar situation.

Kill the Virus in a nostalgic arcade game where 1 credit can last you until this outbreak is over! :)

Save the universe by shooting down the virus and evading its projectiles in this simple, yet challenging game. See how long you can last and then strive to beat your high score.

HOW TO PLAY:
* Touch screen to move and kill the virus.
* Evade the virus projectiles.
* Collect power-ups to upgrade your weapon.

Audio Credits:
* Dylan Cooper Audio - Exploring Strange Things ( Main Menu )
* Kubbi - Cascade ( Gameplay )
* Zero Rare - Retro Pack ( Misc Sound FX )

**This is an .apk file intended for the Android OS.**
